original_title: nothing to do, nowhere to go, no one to be
overview: 'How are you' asks the voice in his ear. 'Okay' Lars answers to avoid the question. The artificial intelligence seems to understand him and tries to help. A group of men. They have identical tents and the same voice in their ear. A post-humanist gaze into the forest.
title: nothing to do, nowhere to go, no one to be
